ECADUPSPCBReferenceDesignatorInfo: defines the Reference Designator to be used for the Printed Circuit Board in the Product Structure
ECADUPSPackageNamePropertyInfo: defines the name of the ECAD property of the Altium Component which is used to derived the Package name during initial import
ECADUPSPackageDescriptionPropertyInfo: defines the name of the ECAD property of the Altium Component which is used to derived the Package Description during initial import
ECADUPSUseClassificationInfo: defines if Library Classification or local categories should be used for electronic Components
ECADUPSElectronicLibraryInfo: defines the top most Library which is used for classifying the Electronic Components. provide the full classification path e.g. \Electronic Library\Components
CadenceAllegroUPSOrCADECADCategoriesInfo: Component Categories to categorize CIS database tables and Symbol OLB in case of non-CIS usage
ECADUPSOrCADUseCISInfo: if enabled, OrCAD CIS license is used and required for managing electronic variants and electronic components through CIS database. If disabled, electronic variants are not used and electronic components are managed in standalone OLB
CadenceAllegroUPSIPC2581ParametersInfo: the IPC2581 Parameters used for Cadence Allegro
ECADClassificationPathDefinitionProperty: Defines the name of the OrCAD Parameter to store the classification path for import
CadenceAllegroUPSOrCADEnterpriseItemNumb: Enterprise Item Number Property in OrCAD
Defines the name of the OrCAD Parameter which holds the Enterprise Item Number
CadenceAllegroUPSAllegroEnterpriseItemNu: Enterprise Item Number Property in Allegro HDL
Defines the name of the Allegro HDL Parameter which holds the Enterprise Item Number
